title: Climb Knight (by AppSir/Darius Immanuel Guerrero)
author: DariusGuerrero
excerpt: Climb Knight from the creator of DERE EVIL EXE, DERE Vengeance, and Spooky Pixel Hero [IMG] [IMG] WEBSITE | DISCORD WATCH TRAILER [MEDIA]...
siteName: TouchArcade - iPhone, iPad, Android Games Forum
text:
Climb Knight from the creator of DERE EVIL EXE, DERE Vengeance, and Spooky Pixel Hero WEBSITE | DISCORD WATCH TRAILER DESCRIPTION​Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"? With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call! Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser. GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go? HAPTIC FEEDBACK Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you. UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress. RETRO FEEL Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match. CHALLENGE FRIENDS Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it. TEST YOUR REFLEXES Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough. CHANGING ENVIRONMENTS The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different. FUN IS INFINITE The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist. If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today! Climb Knight Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global… DetailsStep into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"? With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call! Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser. Why you’ll love it: Global leaderboards: The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go? Haptic feedback: Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you. Unlockable characters: Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress. Retro feel: Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match. Challenge friends: Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it. Changing environments: The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different. Test your reflexes: Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough. Fun is infinite: The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist. If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today! Seller:Darius Immanuel Guerrero TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal ​ Love this. So simple and the old skool graphics are just perfect for this. Paid for the ad removal as a Thankyou to the dev very addictive ! BENCOMO Well-Known Member Patreon Silver Played the game this morning. Love it so much! excellent job Darius! Would love an old skool platformer in the same graphic style (so left/right/jump buttons). Shows its not about the graphics its all about the gameplay. But with these great (and very authentic) LCD style graphics it really adds something to it and that is very appreciated! thanks for being so kind! things like this really help me make more games! i am glad you loved the graphics as well. i wasn't so sure while making it that i had to ask a bunch of people if it was worth pursuing a game that looked like this. while i am not sure yet about making my usual DERE platformer games in the same graphic style, let's see. i do make each DERE game look different from each other so this could be an interesting style thank you so much! i am really happy that you loved it! Looks cool. What are the touchscreen like.....tap, right, left ? Oh it's a one tap game. You just tap to jump and the cute character runs on its own ColeDaddy Silver Supporter
Moderator Staff Member Patreon Silver Patreon Gold Patreon Bronze Wow, what a surprise! Easiest purchase I made today. Keep up the great work! Edit: I watched an ad but 25 points want awarded. FYSA Thank you @ColeDaddy! I always appreciate your support for my weird little games! Sorry about the watch ad thing. I'm not sure how it happened it seemed to work fine for me and the others. Maybe the ad didn't finish playing, or a very rare bug? I'm not really sure. Oh, you mentioned 25 points, but the ad is supposed to award 25 diamonds, maybe it's that? ColeDaddy Silver Supporter
Moderator Staff Member Patreon Silver Patreon Gold Patreon Bronze Yes, perhaps I misremembered what it’s called but watching the ad didn’t increase anything. Not a big deal but I just wanted to bring to your attention that the reward promised wasn’t issued. But thanks for letting me know man! As a solo dev, it’s always a huge help when players report bugs like this, especially with limited resources to catch everything. ​Oh, and just wanted to let people here know that CLIMB KNIGHT just had an update: Update Report - 10/28/24 New alterations have been observed in the original Climb Knight code: - Five New Knights: Unlockable and ready to climb and conquer the tower. - New Haunted Floors: New floors observed. Subjects report heightened sense of dread. - Strange Entities: New unknown presences now stalk the tower. - Floating Eyes: Now yield ten diamonds—use with caution. Technician Anomalies: No reported casualties. Testing continues. END REPORT P.S. Please don't forget to give a review on the store page of the game. Thank you very much! we're featured on the App Store's weekly challenge! try to beat their high score of 55! Share This Page
html:
1. Climb Knight
    from the creator of DERE EVIL EXE, DERE Vengeance, and Spooky Pixel Hero


    WEBSITE | DISCORD

    WATCH TRAILER


    DESCRIPTION​

    Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"?

    With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call!

    Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser.


    GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
    The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go?

    HAPTIC FEEDBACK
    Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you.


    UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS
    Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress.

    RETRO FEEL
    Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match.

    CHALLENGE FRIENDS
    Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it.

    TEST YOUR REFLEXES
    Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough.

    CHANGING ENVIRONMENTS
    The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different.

    FUN IS INFINITE
    The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist.

    If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today!




    Climb Knight

    Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global…
    Details
    Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"? With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call! Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser. Why you’ll love it: Global leaderboards: The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go? Haptic feedback: Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you. Unlockable characters: Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress. Retro feel: Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match. Challenge friends: Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it. Changing environments: The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different. Test your reflexes: Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough. Fun is infinite: The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist. If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today!
    Seller:Darius Immanuel Guerrero
    TouchArcade Rating:Unrated
    Compatibility:HD Universal
    ​

  2. Love this. So simple and the old skool graphics are just perfect for this. Paid for the ad removal as a Thankyou to the dev

    very addictive !

  3. BENCOMO Well-Known Member
    Patreon Silver

    Played the game this morning. Love it so much! excellent job Darius!

  4. Would love an old skool platformer in the same graphic style (so left/right/jump buttons). Shows its not about the graphics its all about the gameplay. But with these great (and very authentic) LCD style graphics it really adds something to it
  5. and that is very appreciated! thanks for being so kind! things like this really help me make more games!

    i am glad you loved the graphics as well. i wasn't so sure while making it that i had to ask a bunch of people if it was worth pursuing a game that looked like this.

    while i am not sure yet about making my usual DERE platformer games in the same graphic style, let's see. i do make each DERE game look different from each other so this could be an interesting style

  6. thank you so much! i am really happy that you loved it!

  7. Looks cool. What are the touchscreen like.....tap, right, left ?
  8. Oh it's a one tap game. You just tap to jump and the cute character runs on its own

  10. ColeDaddy Silver Supporter<br>Moderator
    Staff Member Patreon Silver Patreon Gold Patreon Bronze

    Wow, what a surprise! Easiest purchase I made today. Keep up the great work!
    Edit: I watched an ad but 25 points want awarded. FYSA
  11. Thank you @ColeDaddy! I always appreciate your support for my weird little games!

    Sorry about the watch ad thing. I'm not sure how it happened it seemed to work fine for me and the others. Maybe the ad didn't finish playing, or a very rare bug? I'm not really sure. Oh, you mentioned 25 points, but the ad is supposed to award 25 diamonds, maybe it's that?

  12. ColeDaddy Silver Supporter<br>Moderator
    Staff Member Patreon Silver Patreon Gold Patreon Bronze

    Yes, perhaps I misremembered what it’s called but watching the ad didn’t increase anything. Not a big deal but I just wanted to bring to your attention that the reward promised wasn’t issued.
  13. But thanks for letting me know man! As a solo dev, it’s always a huge help when players report bugs like this, especially with limited resources to catch everything.

    ​
    Oh, and just wanted to let people here know that CLIMB KNIGHT just had an update:

    Update Report - 10/28/24

    New alterations have been observed in the original Climb Knight code:

    - Five New Knights: Unlockable and ready to climb and conquer the tower.

    - New Haunted Floors: New floors observed. Subjects report heightened sense of dread.

    - Strange Entities: New unknown presences now stalk the tower.

    - Floating Eyes: Now yield ten diamonds—use with caution.

    Technician Anomalies: No reported casualties. Testing continues.
    END REPORT

    P.S. Please don't forget to give a review on the store page of the game. Thank you very much!

  14. we're featured on the App Store's weekly challenge! try to beat their high score of 55!
